class.name: BTProbability
class.brief_description: BT decorator that executes its child task with a given probability.
class.description: BTProbability executes its child task with a given probability defined by [member run_chance]. Returns the result of the child task if it was executed; otherwise, it returns [code]FAILURE[/code].

members.member: Probability that defines how likely the child task will be executed.
